org.opcfoundation.ua.utils

Class AbstractState<StateType,ErrorType extends java.lang.Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opcfoundation.ua.utils.AbstractState<StateType,ErrorType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStatefulObject<StateType,ErrorType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractServerConnection, AbstractServerSecureChannel, AsyncRead, AsyncServerSocket, AsyncSocketImpl, AsyncWrite, BufferMonitor, HttpsServer, HttpsServerConnection, HttpsServerSecureChannel, OpcTcpServer, State

    public abstract class AbstractState<StateType,ErrorType extends java.lang.Throwable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStatefulObject<StateType,ErrorType>
    This is a default implementation to IStatefulObject. This class can be subclassed or used as it. The state type is parametrized (typically an enumeration). TODO Remove locks - use spin set and test
    Author:
    Toni Kalajainen (toni.kalajainen@vtt.fi)
    See Also:
    IStatefulObject, Listener for state modifications
